title: invalid argument 2: hex number with leading zero digits
body:
Hi, folks. When running `eth_call` with overrides below I get 

```bash
invalid argument 2: hex number with leading zero digits
```

but I'm able to successfully run it if I fork the live network with ganache. The tx is a `transferFrom` with overrides.

```bash
curl -X POST <Erigon RPC URL> -H "Content-Type: application/json" --data '{"jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "eth_call", "params": [{"from":"0xb634316E06cC0B358437CbadD4dC94F1D3a92B3b", "to":"0x3506424F91fD33084466F402d5D97f05F8e3b4AF", "data":"0x23b872dd000000000000000000000000cdb90e5a0d06f35a71e96467e46ae1822510071e000000000000000000000000b634316e06cc0b358437cbadd4dc94f1d3a92b3b0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000de0b6b3a7640000"},"latest", {"0x3506424F91fD33084466F402d5D97f05F8e3b4AF": {"stateDiff":{"0x9a8b3209a5004a31d98bbf85891c8f12d340ca14b5449dec7f712548fee0da70":"0x00000000000000000000000000000000000000007fffffffffffffffffffffff","0x6a5dadead0dffc0ee6627048a9d1cdfa1037189dd1456007ef92bbcda4a84cef":"0x00000000000000000000000000000000000000007fffffffffffffffffffffff"}}}], "id":1}' 
```

Any idea why I'm getting that error when using the live network? Many thanks
